client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Roose Michiels Janssens at a yacht party in Brussels. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Roose Michiels Janssens is a 27 year old Journalist from Belgium.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description_Family_Background: Roose Michiels Janssens is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Roose finished secondary school at Sint-Bavohumaniora in 2017.
Roose received his degree from University of Liège in 2022.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Roose Michiels Janssens is a 27 year old Journalist from Belgium.
Roose Michiels Janssens began his professional journey as a Journalist at Vlaamse Radio- en Televisieomroeporganisatie (VRT) in 2021, laying the foundation for future success.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 20000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 1170000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Real Estate Developer, in 2019, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
